editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students and travellers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Energy Drink without sugar

editions.name: The Winter Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Winter Edition with the taste of sweet Fuji Apples and spicy notes of Ginger
editions.alt_text: Red Bull Winter Edition Popsicle Image

editions.name: The Peach Edition Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Peach Edition offers the taste of White Peach with a touch of citrus peel and floral notes
editions.alt_text: Red Bull Peach Edition Sugarfree half can

editions.name: The Lilac Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Lilac Edition with the taste of Pink Grapefruit, herbal Woodruff, and floral notes

editions.name: The Pink Edition Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: The Energy Drink with the taste of Raspberry and other fruits complemented by exciting herbal notes of verbena

editions.name: The Purple Edition
editions.flavor_description: Experience the unique taste of exotic Acai Berry. The Red Bull Purple Edition

editions.name: The Sea Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Juneberry Edition with the enticing berry taste of Juneberry. Red Bull The Sea Blue Edition gives you wings with the enticing berry taste
editions.alt_text: Red Bull The Sea Blue Edition - Image

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Apricot Edition offers the perfect blend of Apricot and Strawberry with a touch of Peach taste

editions.name: The White Edition
editions.flavor_description: Get ready for an extraordinary taste experience. The Red Bull White Edition with the taste of exotic Coconut and fruity Blueberry

editions.name: The Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Blue Edition. A classic, with the fruity taste of Blueberry
